Package hc.server.msb

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AnalysableRobotParameter
    this class is used to pass parameter between UI (includes Assistant) and Robot.
    it is helpful for server to analyze the parameter and know more about the relationship between business and user interface.
    Converter
    Converter is useful to convert data format between Robot and Device (device also means data source for cloud), when format between them is inconsistent.
    Device
    A Device means a real equipment controlled by Robot or data source from cloud.
    DeviceCompatibleDescription
    a description about compatible of a device.
    Message
    Message is medium between Robot and Device.
    Robot
    Robot is a intelligent control unit, which manage zero or multiple Device(s).
    RobotEvent
    A semantic event which indicates that a Robot-defined event occurred.
    RobotListener
    The listener for receiving Robot events.
